name: Create, attach and subscribe UI show additional instances when they are connected

inline.description:
1. Connect the test user to 2 instances ex Instance A and Instance B
2. Click the ... menu on a post and open the Jira create modal
inline.expectedResult: The instance select drop down is shown along with the 2 connected instances

inline.description:
1. Connect the test user to 2 instances ex Instance A and Instance B
2. Click the ... menu on a post and open the Jira attach modal
inline.expectedResult: The instance select drop down is shown along with the 2 connected instances

inline.description:
1. Connect the test user to 2 instances ex Instance A and Instance B
2. Ensure the user is a system admin
3. Type /jira subscribe edit
4. Click add
inline.expectedResult:
On 3. The Jira subscribe modal opens
On 4. The instance select drop down is shown along with the 2 connected instances
